entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:50 a.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 1:14 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 1:14 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:14 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
